TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DSA extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class DSA Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 表示数字签名算法（）的所有实现都必须从中继承的抽象基类。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of the Digital Signature Algorithm () must inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用类和派生的类创建的数字签名来帮助保护你的数据的完整性。You can use the class and derived classes to create digital signatures that help protect the integrity of your data. 提供此类的实现。The provides an implementation of this class. 若要使用的公钥系统以数字方式签署一条消息，发送方将先于该消息以创建消息摘要应用哈希函数。To use a public-key system to digitally sign a message, the sender first applies a hash function to the message to create a message digest. 发件人然后使用以创建发件人的个人签名发件人的私钥加密此消息摘要。The sender then encrypts the message digest with the sender's private key to create the sender's personal signature. 在收到消息和签名，接收方使用发件人的公钥来恢复消息摘要解密签名，并使用发件人使用的同一个哈希算法对消息进行哈希处理。Upon receiving the message and signature, the receiver decrypts the signature using the sender's public key to recover the message digest and hashes the message using the same hash algorithm that the sender used. 如果接收方计算完全匹配的消息摘要消息摘要收到来自发件人，接收方可以假定该消息在传输过程中未被更改。If the message digest that the receiver computes exactly matches the message digest received from the sender, the receiver can assume that the message was not altered while in transit. 请注意通过任何人都可以验证签名，这是因为发件人的公钥为常见的知识。Note that a signature can be verified by anyone, because the sender's public key is common knowledge. 较新的非对称算法都可用。Newer asymmetric algorithms are available. 请考虑使用类，类，或类而不是类。Consider using the class, the class, or the class instead of the class. 使用仅为与旧的应用程序和数据的兼容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. 此算法支持密钥长度为 512 位至 1024 位的 64 位的增量。This algorithm supports key lengths from 512 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 64 bits.
